data.name: East Trapper
data.detailed_description:
Update

An update coming next week, 1st november
* Added new levels
* Added a timer on screen that stops once completed


About the Game





Looking for an adventure game with traps to keep you on your toes! Then look no further!
To complete this game you must make your way through different levels of traps with twists and turns.
Future level updates will be made available!


"I had a blast playing this game" - Left4Dead 2 No.1 jockey, Old Man Scraps

Features
- 2D Adventure game
- Hidden Traps to figure out
- 9 "Levels" to complete with more to come
- Once completed you can try to complete in the fastest time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 360 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
